author: Daniel Greene
description:
Big thank you to Squarespace for sponsoring today's video. Be sure to checkout https://www.squarespace.com/danielgreene 
What does your favorite author say about you? 📖✨ In this episode, we’re diving deep into the hidden truths behind your favorite writers—whether you’re a Tolkien purist, a Sanderson speed-reader, or a Miéville mega-fan. From the epic worldbuilders to the grimdark nihilists, I’ll be breaking down what your choice of author reveals about your taste, personality, and reading habits. Do you crave meticulously built magic systems, morally gray characters, or prose so dense it doubles as a doorstop? Let’s find out!
📚 Want More Fantasy & Sci-Fi?

title: What Your Favorite Author REALLY Says About You!
